description: It also helps the firm preserve its business and ensure its longevity.  Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Tackling climate change’s impact on health tops insurer AIA’s sustainability efforts
title_page: Tackling climate change’s impact on health tops insurer AIA’s sustainability efforts | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Investing in the future of the planet also means investing in the health of its customers and the future of its business, says insurer AIA.
The major health insurance player views sustainability as a commitment that leads to benefits for people even as it helps to preserve the business of the company and ensure its longevity.
